name: 卡蜜拉·菲茨吉本
name_full: 卡蜜拉·菲茨吉本 Camila Fitzgibbon
introduction: Camila Fitzgibbon is a Brazilian actor, writer, director, and arts journalist based in Montreal, Canada. Since completing John Abbott's professional acting program in 2019, she has performed on stage and screen on an international scope - most notably, as the Portuguese voice of HLN-A in the 'ARK: Survival' video game series. When not acting, Camila appears regularly on Global TV's Montreal Morning News show reporting as an Arts & Culture Contributor.
